resources.string: awipe will help you wipe a device by writing random data to a file in the internal storage, overwriting free space on the device. For best results, ensure that your phone is encrypted before starting the wipe.\n\nOnce the operation is complete, restart the phone and wipe it clean from recovery.

Warning: awipe will ONLY wipe the free space on the device. Before running awipe, it is strongly recommended to perform a factory reset first, then encrypt the device (if the device isn't already encrypted), then run awipe to ensure that everything will be overwritten!

To verify if the internal storage is successfully filled up, do not delete the temporary file used by the app. This is useful if you are planning to wipe the phone in recovery mode right after running this app.
Are you sure you want to start overwriting? Any overwritten data will not be recoverable!
